languages.text: "По приказу логиса Авеля подняты архивы всех авгур-станций Райкада Минорис и двух главных спутников звезды Райкад, каковые спутники зовутся Магос Маруф и Проницательная Зафира, в честь великих подвижников, чьи внешние когитаторы после смерти их оболочек были помещены в сердца спутников. Цель запрошенного логисом священного вычисления — обнаружить внешнее влияние на нынешнее восстание.

"Upon Logis Abel's orders, the archives of every augur station on Rykad Minoris and the two primary satellites of Rykad's star have been queried. Said satellites are named Magos Ma'rouf and Zafireh the Keen, after two great champions of faith, whose external cogitators were placed inside the satellites' cores after their shells perished. The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the Logis is to uncover the external influence behind the ongoing insurgency."
languages.original_text: "По приказу логиса Авеля подняты архивы всех авгур-станций Райкада Минорис и двух главных спутников звезды Райкад, каковые спутники зовутся Магос Маруф и Проницательная Зафира, в честь великих подвижников, чьи внешние когитаторы после смерти их оболочек были помещены в сердца спутников. Цель запрошенного логисом священного вычисления — обнаружить внешнее влияние на нынешнее восстание.

traits.locale_text: "Upon Logis Abel's orders, the archives of every augur station have been queried on Rykad Minoris and the two primary satellites in stellar orbit around Rykad. Said satellites are named Magos Ma'rouf and Zafireh the Keen, after two great champions of faith whose external cogitators were posthumously placed inside the satellites' cores. The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the logis is to uncover an external influence behind the present insurgency.

"Upon Logis Abel's orders, the archives of every augur station have been queried on Rykad Minoris and the two primary satellites in stellar orbit around Rykad. Said satellites are named Magos Ma'rouf and Zafireh the Keen, after two great champions of faith whose external cogitators were posthumously placed inside the satellites' cores. The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the logis is to uncover an external influence behind the present insurgency.

The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the logis is to uncover the external influence behind the ongoing insurgency.

"Upon Logis Abel's orders, the archives of every augur station on Rykad Minoris and the two primary satellites of Rykad's star have been queried. Said satellites are named Magos Ma'rouf and Zafireh the Keen, after two great champions of faith, whose external cogitators were placed inside the satellites' cores after their shells perished. The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the Logis is to uncover the external influence behind the ongoing insurgency."

languages.text: "Auf Befehl von Logis Abel wurden die Archive sämtlicher Augurenstationen auf Rykad Minoris sowie den zwei primären Satelliten des Rykad-Sterns befragt. Besagte Satelliten heißen Magos Ma'rouf und Zafireh der Eifrige, nach zwei großen Helden des Glaubens, deren externe Cogitatoren in die Kerne der Satelliten eingesetzt wurden, nachdem ihre Hüllen das Zeitliche gesegnet hatten. Zweck der heiligen Berechnung, die vom Logis angestoßen wurde, ist die Aufdeckung des externen Einflusses hinter dem momentanen Aufstand."
languages.original_text: "Upon Logis Abel's orders, the archives of every augur station on Rykad Minoris and the two primary satellites of Rykad's star have been queried. Said satellites are named Magos Ma'rouf and Zafireh the Keen, after two great champions of faith, whose external cogitators were placed inside the satellites' cores after their shells perished. The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the Logis is to uncover the external influence behind the ongoing insurgency."

traits.locale_text: "Auf Befehl von Logis Abel wurden die Archive sämtlicher Augurenstationen auf Rykad Minoris sowie den zwei primären Satelliten des Rykad-Sterns befragt. Besagte Satelliten heißen Magos Ma'rouf und Zafireh der Eifrige, nach zwei großen Helden des Glaubens, deren externe Cogitatoren in die Kerne der Satelliten eingesetzt wurden, nachdem ihre Hüllen das Zeitliche gesegnet hatten. Zweck der heiligen Berechnung, die vom Logis angestoßen wurde, ist die Aufdeckung des externen Einflusses hinter dem momentanen Aufstand.

languages.text: « Sur ordre du logis Abel, les archives de toutes les stations d'augures sur Rykad Minoris et les deux principaux satellites de l'étoile de Rykad ont été interrogées. Lesdits satellites ont été baptisés Magos Ma'rouf et Zafireh l'Enthousiaste, en l'honneur de deux grands champions de la foi, dont les cogitateurs externes ont été placés au cœur des satellites après la mort de leurs enveloppes. Le but du calcul sacré demandé par le logis est de découvrir l'influence extérieure à l'origine de l'insurrection en cours. »
languages.original_text: "Upon Logis Abel's orders, the archives of every augur station on Rykad Minoris and the two primary satellites of Rykad's star have been queried. Said satellites are named Magos Ma'rouf and Zafireh the Keen, after two great champions of faith, whose external cogitators were placed inside the satellites' cores after their shells perished. The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the Logis is to uncover the external influence behind the ongoing insurgency."

traits.locale_text: « Sur ordre du logis Abel, les archives de toutes les stations d'augures sur Rykad Minoris et les deux principaux satellites de l'étoile de Rykad ont été interrogées. Lesdits satellites ont été baptisés Magos Ma'rouf et Zafireh l'Enthousiaste, en l'honneur de deux grands champions de la foi, dont les cogitateurs externes ont été placés au cœur des satellites après la mort de leurs enveloppes. Le but du calcul sacré demandé par le logis est de découvrir l'influence extérieure à l'origine de l'insurrection en cours. »

languages.text: “根据逻辑士亚伯的指示，我们查过了小莱卡德上每座扫描站，还查过了莱卡德星系里两颗主要卫星的档案。这两颗卫星分别叫‘玛鲁夫贤者’和‘敏锐者扎菲瑞’，以两位伟大的信仰斗士的名字命名。它们的外壳消亡之后，外部沉思者便被内置在卫星的核心中。逻辑士想要获得它们神圣计算的数据，借此弄清促成这场叛乱的外部力量。”
languages.original_text: "Upon Logis Abel's orders, the archives of every augur station on Rykad Minoris and the two primary satellites of Rykad's star have been queried. Said satellites are named Magos Ma'rouf and Zafireh the Keen, after two great champions of faith, whose external cogitators were placed inside the satellites' cores after their shells perished. The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the Logis is to uncover the external influence behind the ongoing insurgency."

traits.locale_text: “根据逻辑士亚伯的指示，我们查过了小莱卡德上每座扫描站，还查过了莱卡德星系里两颗主要卫星的档案。这两颗卫星分别叫‘玛鲁夫贤者’和‘敏锐者扎菲瑞’，以两位伟大的信仰斗士的名字命名。它们的外壳消亡之后，外部思考器便被内置在卫星的核心中。逻辑士想要获得它们神圣计算的数据，借此弄清促成这场叛乱的外部力量。”

languages.text: 「論理学者アベルの指示で、ライカド・ミノリスのすべてのスキャナー・ステーションと、ライカド星の2つの主要な衛星のアーカイブが照会された。前述した衛星は、2人の偉大な信仰の覇者にちなんで、マゴス・マルーフとザフィレ・ザ・キーンと名付けられ、2人の外部考算機は本体が消滅した後、衛星のコア内に設置された。論理学者が求める神聖なる計算の目的は、現在起こっている反乱の背後にある、外部の影響を明らかにすることだ」
languages.original_text: "Upon Logis Abel's orders, the archives of every augur station on Rykad Minoris and the two primary satellites of Rykad's star have been queried. Said satellites are named Magos Ma'rouf and Zafireh the Keen, after two great champions of faith, whose external cogitators were placed inside the satellites' cores after their shells perished. The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the Logis is to uncover the external influence behind the ongoing insurgency."

traits.locale_text: 「論理学者アベルの指示で、ライカド・ミノリスのすべてのスキャナー・ステーションと、ライカド星の2つの主要な衛星のアーカイブが照会された。前述した衛星は、2人の偉大な信仰の覇者にちなんで、マゴス・マルーフとザフィレ・ザ・キーンと名付けられ、2人の外部考算機は本体が消滅した後、衛星のコア内に設置された。論理学者が求める神聖なる計算の目的は、現在起こっている反乱の背後にある、外部の影響を明らかにすることだ」

languages.text: «Por orden del Logos Abel, se han consultado los archivos de todas las estaciones de augures de Rykad Minoris y de los dos satélites primarios de la estrella Rykad. Dichos satélites reciben los nombres de Magos Ma'rouf y Zafireh el Sagaz, en honor a dos grandes campeones de la fe, cuyos cogitadores externos fueron colocados en el interior de los núcleos de los satélites tras perder sus cortezas. El objetivo del cómputo sagrado solicitado por los logos es descubrir la influencia externa que hay detrás de la insurgencia».
languages.original_text: "Upon Logis Abel's orders, the archives of every augur station on Rykad Minoris and the two primary satellites of Rykad's star have been queried. Said satellites are named Magos Ma'rouf and Zafireh the Keen, after two great champions of faith, whose external cogitators were placed inside the satellites' cores after their shells perished. The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the Logis is to uncover the external influence behind the ongoing insurgency."

traits.locale_text: «Por orden del Logos Abel, se han consultado los archivos de todas las estaciones de augures de Rykad Minoris y de los dos satélites primarios de la estrella Rykad. Dichos satélites reciben los nombres de Magos Ma'rouf y Zafireh el Sagaz, en honor a dos grandes campeones de la fe, cuyos cogitadores externos fueron colocados en el interior de los núcleos de los satélites tras perder sus cortezas. El objetivo del cómputo sagrado solicitado por los logos es descubrir la influencia externa que hay detrás de la insurgencia.

languages.text: "Logis Abel'in emirleri üzerine, Rykad Minoris ile Rykad'ın yıldızının iki birincil uydusundaki her alamet istasyonu arşivi tarandı. Söz konusu uyduların adları Magos Ma'rouf ve Aydın Zafireh'dir. Uydulara, kabukları ölünce dış kavramsayarları bu iki uydunun çekirdeklerine yerleştirilen imanın iki müdafisinin adı verilmiştir. Logis'in talep ettiği kutsal bilgisayımın amacı, süregelmekte olan ayaklanmayı körükleyen haricî tesirleri açığa çıkarmaktır."
languages.original_text: "Upon Logis Abel's orders, the archives of every augur station on Rykad Minoris and the two primary satellites of Rykad's star have been queried. Said satellites are named Magos Ma'rouf and Zafireh the Keen, after two great champions of faith, whose external cogitators were placed inside the satellites' cores after their shells perished. The purpose of the sacred computation requested by the Logis is to uncover the external influence behind the ongoing insurgency."

traits.locale_text: "Logis Abel'in emirleri üzerine Rykad Minoris'teki her alamet istasyonu arşivi ve Rykad'ın yıldızının iki birincil uydusu araştırıldı. Söz konusu uyduların adları Magos Ma'rouf ve Yılmaz Zafireh'dir. Uydulara, kabukları can verince dış kavramsayarları bu iki uydunun çekirdeklerine yerleştirilen iki imanlı müdafinin adı verilmiştir. Logis'in talep ettiği kutsal hesaplamanın amacı, süregelmekte olan ayaklanmayı körükleyen harici tesirleri açığa çıkarmaktır."
